[Demon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1388) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

[Pitborn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1383)

You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects. You can cast [_paranoia_](/Spells.aspx?ID=214) and [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
